description:
We are "building better future" in this century for our kids, through technology & engineering education, in order to do just that we provide Project Based Learning Courses in:

* Robotics
* 3D Printing
* CAD Design
* Internet of Things
* Unmanned Aerial Systems
* Coding / Programming
* Raspberry Pi's
* Arduino's
* Chip
* and much more

We work with non-profit, state agencies, university outreach programs, who in terms applied for grants to offer undeserved children afterschool and summer programs in Technology & Engineering.

Summer camp is provided for 6 weeks from July to mid August.
name: AUGMENTED INTELLIGENCE ACADEMY, INC.
